channel.title: Problem loading
channel.description:
im running moparscape in a Mac (just traduced the launcher of inux to mac) but im getting sometimes this error (its common but sometimes it enters the game) [code][12:26:38] Starting MoparScape 3.0 [12:26:38] Playing 0-hangar.mid Exception in thread "main" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Out of Memory at com.sun.media.sound.HeadspaceMixer.nOpenMixer(Native Method) at com.sun.media.sound.HeadspaceMixer.implOpen(HeadspaceMixer.java:340) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMixer.open(AbstractMixer.java:286) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMixer.open(AbstractMixer.java:323) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractDataLine.open(AbstractDataLine.java:103) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractDataLine.open(AbstractDataLine.java:399) at com.sun.media.sound.HeadspaceMixer.open(HeadspaceMixer.java:522) at com.sun.media.sound.MixerSynth.implOpen(MixerSynth.java:152) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.doOpen(AbstractMidiDevice.java:144) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.openInternal(AbstractMidiDevice.java:134) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.getReceiverReferenceCounting(AbstractMidiDevice.java:339) at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getReceiver(MidiSystem.java:243) at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getSequencer(MidiSystem.java:442) at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getSequencer(MidiSystem.java:348) at Bot.midiPlayer(Bot.java:193) at Bot.<init>(Bot.java:142) at Bot.main(Bot.java:115)[/code]
anyone think can help me?

item.title: Problem loading
item.dc:creator: @Meoiswa Meoiswa
item.description:
@Meoiswa wrote:

ill give it a try, thank you n.n[br][size=1]Posted at: August 27, 2006, 03:41:54 PM[/size][hr]OMG thank you xD soo simple it seems that when it loads the music it “runs out of memory” and crashes, i just renamed Music to mMusic

Read full topic

item.title: Problem loading
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

id say maybe to just delete the midi’s in the music folder… or no wait dont delete cause that might not be the problem just move them or change the capital M to a lower case m on the Music folder so it cant target it

Read full topic

item.title: Problem loading
item.dc:creator: @Meoiswa Meoiswa
item.description:
@Meoiswa wrote:

im running moparscape in a Mac (just traduced the launcher of inux to mac) but im getting sometimes this error (its common but sometimes it enters the game)

[12:26:38] Starting MoparScape 3.0 [12:26:38] Playing 0-hangar.mid Exception in thread "main" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Out of Memory at com.sun.media.sound.HeadspaceMixer.nOpenMixer(Native Method) at com.sun.media.sound.HeadspaceMixer.implOpen(HeadspaceMixer.java:340) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMixer.open(AbstractMixer.java:286) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMixer.open(AbstractMixer.java:323) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractDataLine.open(AbstractDataLine.java:103) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractDataLine.open(AbstractDataLine.java:399) at com.sun.media.sound.HeadspaceMixer.open(HeadspaceMixer.java:522) at com.sun.media.sound.MixerSynth.implOpen(MixerSynth.java:152) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.doOpen(AbstractMidiDevice.java:144) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.openInternal(AbstractMidiDevice.java:134) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.getReceiverReferenceCounting(AbstractMidiDevice.java:339) at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getReceiver(MidiSystem.java:243) at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getSequencer(MidiSystem.java:442) at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getSequencer(MidiSystem.java:348) at Bot.midiPlayer(Bot.java:193) at Bot.<init>(Bot.java:142) at Bot.main(Bot.java:115)

anyone think can help me?
